nodes.text: Loatha Sommover was a brown-skinned alien who was spent time in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica in the year 34 ABY. Sommover wore a neural wave relaxer helmet, a black coat and a ring that was both a comlink and a piece of decorative jewelery. The alien had a large slug-like body with four pairs of two-toed legs and one larger pair of three-fingered arms further up their body below a head with a mouth, nose and two eyes.

Loatha Sommover first appeared in the film Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, which was released on December 15, 2017. The character was not named in the film, but received identification in Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released in conjunction with the film. During production of The Last Jedi, concept art of Sommover titled "King 12" was produced by creature concept designer and senior sculptor Ivan Manzella.
